Tata Cliq

AURUM Milestone Benefit

Tata Cliq

₹1500

What’s Inside

  • Earn TATA Cliq Voucher worth ₹1500, with a Validity of 6 Months on doing monthly spends of ₹1 lakh in previous month

Terms and conditions

  • Earn TATA Cliq Voucher worth ₹1500, with a Validity of 6 Months- on achieving monthly spends of ₹1 lakh
  • E-Voucher to eligible card holders will be sent within one month of eligibility.
  • Protect the E-Gift card number and PIN to avoid misuse
  • E-Gift Voucher is combination of 16-digit Card number and 6-digit PIN
  • E-Gift Voucher is received by customers through Email or SMS
  • Valid at all platforms of Tata Unistore Limited in India
  • Valid on all merchandise
  • Redeemable during all Sales & Promotional Pricing Offers.
  • Valid for redemption during End of Season Sales.
  • Any disputes/s shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts in Mumbai.
  • To check balance mail to be sent to CS team (hello@tatacliq.com) with the card number. This option is to be used if the details are not available to the customers in their CLiQ Cash account.
  • Any dispute/s relating to Tata Unistore Limited shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Mumbai.
